tool_description:
Accurate localization services

Email and phone validators are already available.

We are ramping up, stay tuned for new features!
title: Localization services

api_list.name: validate phone
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://localization-services.p.rapidapi.com/phone/validate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "localization-services.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
